General.Name: Balkrishna Paper Mills Limited
General.Description: Balkrishna Paper Mills Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of paper and paper boards in India. It offers eco, chromo white back, eco-white, eco kraft back, and duplex coated boards. The company serves pharmaceuticals, cosmetics, health care products, ready made garments, food products, match boxes, and FMCG sectors. It also exports its products. Balkrishna Paper Mills Limited was founded in 1975 and is based in Mumbai, India.
